SourceSentence: He didn’t buy any bread yesterday.
TargetSentence: Il n’a pas acheté de pain hier.
eval_AcceptableTranslations: Il n’a pas acheté de pain hier.

SourceSentence: Although it was raining, they continued to walk.
TargetSentence: Bien qu’il pleuvait, ils ont continué à marcher.
eval_AcceptableTranslations: Bien qu’il pleuvait, ils ont continué à marcher.|Bien qu’il pleuve, ils ont continué à marcher.

SourceSentence: He didn’t buy any bread yesterday.
TargetSentence: Er hat gestern kein Brot gekauft.

SourceSentence: Although it was raining, they continued to walk.
TargetSentence: Obwohl es regnete, gingen sie weiter.
